name: Backhill
description:
Backhill is a first-person horror game set in a creepy hospital, which patients do not seem to leave. After finding out you were in a car accident life only gets worse. You step into the hole in the wall which enters you into the nightmare realm of Backhill. Your only hope is a torch, and notes left by previous unfortunates who have been stranded in this world. Survive, for that's all you can do.

This game is still a  work in progress so we really value your honest feedback. Please let us know about any issues you encounter or any feedback you'd like to give us, positive or negative using the forms below:

Feedback Form: https://forms.office.com/r/p1MmgfgW9w

Bug Report: https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=zeSE1hpJd0W_M1RkeNcuPC23-DbS...
